modules.name: Content Quality
modules.description: Evaluates depth, accuracy, and comprehensiveness of content
insights: Content demonstrates exceptional expertise with comprehensive technical explanations
All pages exceed 2,000 words with highly substantive information
Content is regularly updated with recent data and case studies

issues.message: 3 pages could benefit from more visual content

recommendations.title: Add visual content to key pages
recommendations.description: Enhance 3 pages with infographics and charts to improve engagement
actionItems: Add comparison charts to product pages
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 2-3 point increase in Content Quality score

modules.name: E-E-A-T Signals
modules.description: Expertise, Experience, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness indicators
insights: Author bylines present on 95% of content pages
Comprehensive author profiles with credentials and experience
Strong industry recognition and citations

recommendations.title: Maintain current E-E-A-T standards
recommendations.description: Continue current practices for author attribution and expertise signals

modules.name: Technical SEO
modules.description: Site structure, performance, and technical implementation
insights: Excellent Core Web Vitals scores across all pages
Proper schema markup implementation
Mobile-responsive design with fast load times

issues.message: Some images could be further optimized

recommendations.title: Optimize remaining images
recommendations.description: Further compress 5 images to improve load times
actionItems: Run image optimization on 5 identified pages
Convert to WebP format where applicable
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 1-2 point increase in Technical SEO score

modules.name: AI Readability
modules.description: How well content is structured for AI search engines
insights: Clear content structure with proper headings
Good use of structured data
Content is well-formatted for AI parsing

modules.name: Link Profile
modules.description: Quality and relevance of inbound and internal links
insights: Strong internal linking structure
Good quality backlinks from authoritative domains
No orphaned pages

modules.name: User Intent Alignment
modules.description: How well content matches search intent and user queries
insights: Excellent alignment with user search intent
Content depth matches user expectations
Clear value proposition on all pages

modules.name: Brand Signals
modules.description: Brand mentions, citations, and online presence
insights: Strong brand presence across multiple platforms
Consistent brand messaging
Good citation coverage
